pages.text: This section will outline all basic processing electrical machines, accessible to you at the start of the $(l:age3)Electrical Age.$()$(p)Many of these machines can support upgrades! More information on these are available on the $(l:items/upgrades)Upgrades Page!
This will purify an item with two purifying catalyst items added in. For more information, view the guide on the $(l:age3)Electrical Age.$()
This device performs the operation of the Grinding recipes from Age 1 and 2, but with electricity!$(p)Unlike the Simple Grinder, this one does not need any blade.
This will perform basic Minecraft smelting recipes, but with energy and power!
This performs all Fluid Bath and Mixer recipes from Age 1 and 2.$(p)Unlike the Simple Fluid Mixer, this one has an internal capacity for fluid.
This will break down logs into more of their corresponding planks, six to be precise. It also has a chance to output some Sawdust as a byproduct!
This machine will press a variety of things into a variety of other things, depending on what type of $(l:items/molds)Mold$() you have within. Required for making late-game Rods and Plates.
Combines two metals into one alloy metal. For more information, view the guide on the $(l:age3)Electrical Age.
